brandStory.title: From Shipwreck to Shoreline
brandStory.content: Every piece from Tasmanian Treasures begins its journey in the tempestuous Southern Ocean. We walk remote shores after every storm, searching for the smoothest, most character-filled pieces of glass and discarded pottery from a bygone era. We don’t alter their shape or color—we simply give them a new purpose, preserving their wild history for you to cherish.

finalCta.title: Find Your Piece of the Southern Ocean
finalCta.content: Our collections are crafted in small batches based on what the tides reveal. Explore our current treasures.
